resources.string: \t\tWeâ€™re trying to solve bad trash management that has been in Indonesia for many years now. The public still littering at the side of the road and not sorting their trash are a couple of reasons why Indonesia has such bad trash management.\n\n\t\tEcotup is a service application that can be used to call a service to help you throw your trash with just a press of a button. With this application, we are hoping to improve public awareness with the reward system and the project can also answer problems on how to solve littering and laziness of throwing trash in Indonesia.
Ecotup, as an application that provides mobile-based waste transportation services, is here to make it easier for you to take real action for the environment.
Using advanced technology, Ecotup brings eco-friendly concepts to your fingertips.
A service application that can be used to call a service to help you throw your trash with just a press of a button.
